data.text:
Nicholas Grose

Born Nov 1643 in Luxulyan, Cornwall, England

Ancestors

Son of George Grose and Agnes Unknown

Brother of Jane Grose

Husband of Mary Bridgman — married [date unknown] [location unknown]

Husband of Mary (Bridgeman) Grose — married 30 Nov 1672 in Luxulyan, Cornwall, England

Descendants

Died 9 Oct 1694 at age 50 in Luxulyan, Cornwall, England

Profile last modified 4 Jul 2022 | Created 23 Nov 2013

This page has been accessed 448 times.

Biography

Nicholas Grose was born in Luxulyan, Cornwall, England.

Nicholas, the son of George and Agnes Grose was born in 1643 and baptized on 19 November of that year in Luxulyan, Cornwall.[1]

Nicholas married Mary Bridgman (1652-1733) on 30 November 1672 at Luxulyan.{Needs source}.

Nicholas Grose died on the 9th October 1694 intestate. He had been a livestock farmer and Letters of Administration of his possessions were granted to Mary Grose his wife. An inventory was made by Ambrose Grose and John Wellington on 20th.November 1694 and his possessions were valued at £171. 19s. 8d.[2]
